title: Resistor value in circuit with capacitor

content.question: In the circuit above, the current through the battery a long time after switch <math alttext="S" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>S</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is closed is <math alttext="2 amps" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>2 A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the resistance of resistor <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The resistance of resistor <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> cannot be determined from information about the steady state.

content.answer: The resistance of resistor <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> cannot be determined from information about the steady state.
